attributes.action: remove Speaker Bercow from the chair
attributes.background: remove the biast speaker who is only out for his own gain chosing what suits him and not the will of the people. example indicative votes all remain options and trying to block any motion of leaving that does not suit him. a speaker should be impartial. Mr Bercow is far from this.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
